verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses רְאֵ֛ה <WH7200> See נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <WH5414> I have made אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> thee a god לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh וְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> and Aaron אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> thy brother יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become נְבִיאֶֽךָ׃ <WH5030> shall be thy prophet

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You תְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> Thou shalt speak אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i אֲצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <WH6680> all that I command וְאַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> thee and Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> thy brother יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> shall speak אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> that he send אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> out of his land

וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אַקְשֶׁ֖ה <WH7185> And I will harden אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <WH7235> and multiply אֶת־ <WH853> אֹתֹתַ֛י <WH226> my signs וְאֶת־ <WH853> מוֹפְתַ֖י <WH4159> and my wonders בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> shall not hearken אֲלֵכֶם֙ <WH413> when פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> But Pharaoh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> unto you that I may lay אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֖י <WH3027> my hand בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> upon Egypt וְהוֹצֵאתִ֨י <WH3318> and bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> צִבְאֹתַ֜י <WH6635> mine armies אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֤י <WH5971> [and] my people בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בִּשְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> by great

וְיָדְע֤וּ <WH3045> shall know מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בִּנְטֹתִ֥י <WH5186> when I stretch forth אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֖י <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> and מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וְהוֹצֵאתִ֥י <WH3318> and bring out אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִתּוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> from among

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> and Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> thus עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> them so did

וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> [was] fourscore שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וְאַֽהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> and three וּשְׁמֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> fourscore שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years בְּדַבְּרָ֖ם <WH1696> when they spake אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> unto Pharaoh פ
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כִּי֩ <WH3588> When יְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> shall speak אֲלֵכֶ֤ם <WH413> about פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> When Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto you saying תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> Shew לָכֶ֖ם מוֹפֵ֑ת <WH4159> a miracle וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> for you then thou shalt say אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron קַ֧ח <WH3947> Take אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַטְּךָ֛ <WH4294> thy rod וְהַשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> and cast לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> [it] before פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> Pharaoh יְהִ֥י <WH1961> may become לְתַנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> [and] it shall become a serpent

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> went in מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וַיַּ֣עַשׂוּ <WH6213> and they did כֵ֔ן <WH3651> and thus כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> so as the LORD וַיַּשְׁלֵ֨ךְ <WH7993> cast down אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> and Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּ֗הוּ <WH4294> his rod לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> his servants וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became לְתַנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> and it became a serpent

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> also called גַּם־ <WH1571> also פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Then Pharaoh לַֽחֲכָמִ֖ים <WH2450> the wise men וְלַֽמְכַשְּׁפִ֑ים <WH3784> and the sorcerers וַיַּֽעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> they also did גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֜ם <WH1992> like חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <WH2748> now the magicians מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּלַהֲטֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3858> with their enchantments כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> in like manner

וַיַּשְׁלִ֙יכוּ֙ <WH7993> For they cast down אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man מַטֵּ֔הוּ <WH4294> his rod וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> turned לְתַנִּינִ֑ם <WH8577> and they became serpents וַיִּבְלַ֥ע <WH1104> swallowed up מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> rod אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> but Aaron's אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֹּתָֽם׃ <WH4294> their rods

וַיֶּחֱזַק֙ <WH2388> And he hardened לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> that he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> not unto them as the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses כָּבֵ֖ד <WH3515> [is] hardened לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's מֵאֵ֖ן <WH3985> he refuseth לְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> to let the people

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֞ה <WH6547> thee unto Pharaoh בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> lo he goeth out הַמַּ֔יְמָה <WH4325> unto the water וְנִצַּבְתָּ֥ <WH5324> and thou shalt stand לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <WH7125> against he come עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> brink הַיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> by the river's וְהַמַּטֶּ֛ה <WH4294> and the rod אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> which was turned לְנָחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> to a serpent תִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> shalt thou take בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> in thine hand

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And thou shalt say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God הָעִבְרִים֙ <WH5680> of the Hebrews שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> me unto thee saying שַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻ֖נִי <WH5647> that they may serve בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> me in the wilderness וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold לֹא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> thou wouldest not hear עַד־ <WH5704> until כֹּֽה׃ <WH3541> and behold hitherto

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּזֹ֣את <WH2063> you תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> In this thou shalt know כִּ֖י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מַכֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH5221> behold I will smite בַּמַּטֶּ֣ה <WH4294> with the rod אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is in בְּיָדִ֗י <WH3027> that [is] in mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> upon the waters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> which [are] in the river וְנֶהֶפְכ֥וּ <WH2015> and they shall be turned לְדָֽם׃ <WH1818> to blood

וְהַדָּגָ֧ה <WH1710> And the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that בַּיְאֹ֛ר <WH2975> that [is] in the river תָּמ֖וּת <WH4191> shall die וּבָאַ֣שׁ <WH887> shall stink הַיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> and the river וְנִלְא֣וּ <WH3811> shall lothe מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> to drink מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of the water מִן־ <WH4480> are in הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> of the river ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <WH175> unto Aaron קַ֣ח <WH3947> Take מַטְּךָ֣ <WH4294> thy rod וּנְטֵֽה־ <WH5186> and stretch out יָדְךָ֩ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> over מֵימֵ֨י <WH4325> upon the waters מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַֽל־ <WH5921> over נַהֲרֹתָ֣ם ׀ <WH5104> upon their streams עַל־ <WH5921> over יְאֹרֵיהֶ֣ם <WH2975> upon their rivers וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over אַגְמֵיהֶ֗ם <WH98> and upon their ponds וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> and over כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִקְוֵ֥ה <WH4723> and upon all their pools מֵימֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4325> of water וְיִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> may become דָ֑ם <WH1818> that they may become blood וְהָ֤יָה <WH1961> may become דָם֙ <WH1818> and [that] there may be blood בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּבָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> both in [vessels of] wood וּבָאֲבָנִֽים׃ <WH68> and in [vessels of] stone

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵן֩ <WH3651> even מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> and Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> so as the LORD וַיָּ֤רֶם <WH7311> and he lifted up בַּמַּטֶּה֙ <WH4294> the rod וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the waters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was בַּיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> that [were] in the river לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וּלְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> and in the sight עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> of his servants וַיֵּהָֽפְכ֛וּ <WH2015> were turned כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> and all the waters אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was בַּיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> that [were] in the river לְדָֽם׃ <WH1818> to blood

וְהַדָּגָ֨ה <WH1710> And the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> were בַּיְאֹ֥ר <WH2975> that [was] in the river מֵ֙תָה֙ <WH4191> died וַיִּבְאַ֣שׁ <WH887> stank הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> and the river וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָכְל֣וּ <WH3201> could מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> not drink מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of the water מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> of the river וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> and there was blood בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> and the Egyptians

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵ֛ן <WH3651> the same חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <WH2748> And the magicians מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3909> so with their enchantments וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> was hardened לֵב־ <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> and Pharaoh's וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> neither did he hearken אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto them as the LORD

וַיִּ֣פֶן <WH6437> turned פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and went אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> into his house וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no שָׁ֥ת <WH7896> neither did he set לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> his heart גַּם־ <WH1571> even לָזֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> to this

וַיַּחְפְּר֧וּ <WH2658> digged כָל־ <WH3605> all מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4713> Egyptian סְבִיבֹ֥ת <WH5439> round about הַיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> the river מַ֣יִם <WH4325> for water לִשְׁתּ֑וֹת <WH8354> to drink כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָֽכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> for they could לִשְׁתֹּ֔ת <WH8354> not drink מִמֵּימֵ֖י <WH4325> of the water הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> of the river

וַיִּמָּלֵ֖א <WH4390> were fulfilled שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> And seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after הַכּוֹת־ <WH5221> had smitten יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> the river פ
